traits.dark-vision: within 60ft you can see in dim light as if it were bright light and darkness as if it were dim
traits.dwarven-resilience: advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and resistant against poison damage
traits.dwarven-combat-training: Proficent with the battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and war hammer
traits.stonecunning: double proficiency bonus on history checks related to the history of stonework, considered proficient on these checks

traits.dark-vision: within 60ft you can see in dim light as if it were bright light and darkness as if it were dim
traits.fey-ancestry: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep
traits.trance: Your long rest is 4 hours instead of 8

traits.lucky: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, saving throw, or ability check you can reroll the dice and must use the new roll
traits.brave: advantage on saving throws against being frightened
traits.halfling-nimbleness: You can move through the space of a creature that is a size larger than you

traits.dark-vision: within 60ft you can see in dim light as if it were bright light and darkness as if it were dim
traits.fey-ancestry: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep
traits.skill-versatillity: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice
